text: How can i write 'one bit' into a file stream or file structure each time?
is it possible to write to a queue and then flush it ?
is it possible with c# or java?
this was needed when i try to implement an instance of Huffman codding.
i can't write bits into files.
so write them to a bitset and then (when compression was completed) write 8-bit piece of it each time (exclude last one).
